snippet: Andres Iniesta, who helped Spain to a second successive European Championship triumph in Poland and Ukraine, was named the best player at the tournament by UEFA on Monday.
abstract: Andres Iniesta is named best player of the European Championships after helping Spain become the first nation to successfully defend the continental crown.
lead_paragraph: Andres Iniesta, who helped Spain to a second successive European Championship triumph in Poland and Ukraine, was named the best player at the tournament by UEFA on Monday.

headline.seo: Spain’s Iniesta Named Euro 2012’s Best Player
headline.main: Spain’s Iniesta Named Euro 2012’s Best Player
